classMode.description: If you are a professor and would like to use Velocity in your classroom, then class mode is the one for you.
classMode.features: This mode offers features like: Making assignments, assigning groups, adding teaching assistants, creating rubrics/marking criteria, and much more.
classMode.title: Class Mode

collaboratorMode.description: If you would like to organize your projects using scrum/kanban boards, then collaborator mode is the one for you.
collaboratorMode.features: This mode offers features like: Making projects, working with others under an organization, organization using both scrum and kanban, and much more.
collaboratorMode.title: Collaborator Mode

modeSelector.description: Please select the mode that you would like to use
modeSelector.title: Welcome to Velocity!

pageNotFound.title: Velocity Page Not Found
pageNotFound.description: We could not find the page you were looking for
